00035 /* creates the application's main gui form. */
00036 MainForm::MainForm() {
00037     /* try to establish app's settings. */
00038     establishSettings();
00039 
00040     /* create the panels for the customers and vehicles. */
00041     createCustomerPanel();
00042     createVehiclePanel();
00043 
00044     /* split horizontally the two panels with a splitter. */
00045     splitter = new QSplitter(Qt::Horizontal);
00046     splitter->setFrameStyle(QFrame::StyledPanel);
00047     splitter->addWidget(customerPanel);
00048     splitter->addWidget(vehiclePanel);
00049 
00050     /* create the buttons of the main form. */
00051     editButtonVehicle = new QPushButton(vehiclesButtonStr);
00052     editButtonCustomer = new QPushButton(customersButtonStr);
00053     editButtonTransaction = new QPushButton(transactsButtonStr);
00054     buttonReportTransaction = new QPushButton(reportButtonStr);
00055     buttonGuestVehicles = new QPushButton(guestVehiclesStr);
00056     quitButton = new QPushButton(quitButtonStr);
00057     settingsButton = new QPushButton(settingsButtonStr);
00058 
00059     /* create the about toolbutton. */
00060     aboutButton = new QToolButton;
00061     aboutButton->setIcon(QIcon(":/graphics/window/about-icon"));
00062 
00063     /* add the buttons in a button box dialog. */
00064     buttonBox = new QDialogButtonBox;
00065     buttonBox->addButton(buttonGuestVehicles, QDialogButtonBox::ActionRole);
00066     buttonBox->addButton(buttonReportTransaction, QDialogButtonBox::ActionRole);
00067     buttonBox->addButton(editButtonVehicle, QDialogButtonBox::ActionRole);
00068     buttonBox->addButton(editButtonCustomer, QDialogButtonBox::ActionRole);
00069     buttonBox->addButton(editButtonTransaction, QDialogButtonBox::ActionRole);
00070 
00071     /* set the following button as checkable (as toogle button). */
00072     buttonGuestVehicles->setCheckable(true);
00073 
00074     /* set the signals/slots for the buttons' events. */
00075     connect(customerView, SIGNAL(doubleClicked(QModelIndex)), this, SLOT(editCustomers()));
00076     connect(vehicleView, SIGNAL(doubleClicked(QModelIndex)), this, SLOT(editVehicles()));
00077     connect(buttonReportTransaction, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(reportTransactions()));
00078     connect(editButtonTransaction, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(editTransactions()));
00079     connect(editButtonCustomer, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(editCustomers()));
00080     connect(editButtonVehicle, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(editVehicles()));
00081     connect(buttonGuestVehicles, SIGNAL(toggled(const bool)), this, SLOT(handleGuestVehicles(const bool)));
00082     connect(settingsButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(editSettings()));
00083     connect(quitButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(close()));
00084     connect(aboutButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(handleAbout()));
00085 
00086     /* create a vertical and a horizontal layout. */
00087     QVBoxLayout *mainVLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00088     QHBoxLayout *mainHLayout = new QHBoxLayout;
00089 
00090     /* add the splitter to the vertical layout. */
00091     mainVLayout->addWidget(splitter);
00092 
00093     /* set the settings button and the button box to the horizontal layout. */
00094     mainHLayout->addWidget(aboutButton);
00095     mainHLayout->addWidget(settingsButton);
00096     mainHLayout->addStretch();
00097     mainHLayout->addWidget(buttonBox, 0, Qt::AlignHCenter);
00098     mainHLayout->addStretch();
00099     mainHLayout->addWidget(quitButton);
00100 
00101     /* add the buttons bar to the vertical layout. */
00102     mainVLayout->addLayout(mainHLayout);
00103 
00104     /* set the layout to the main form. */
00105     setLayout(mainVLayout);
00106 
00107     /* set the window title of the main form. */
00108     setWindowTitle(appName);
00109 
00110     /* set the icon of the window. */
00111     setWindowIcon(QIcon(":/graphics/window/window-icon"));
00112 
00113     /* resize the form to dekstop size and also maximize the window. */
00114     resize(QApplication::desktop()->size());
00115     showMaximized();
00116 
00117     /* show/hide the header of the vehicles view according of the records count. */
00118     vehicleView->horizontalHeader()->setVisible(vehicleModel->rowCount() > 0);
00119 
00120     /* show/hide the header of the customers view according of the records count. */
00121     customerView->horizontalHeader()->setVisible(customerModel->rowCount() > 0);
00122 
00123     /* select the first customer (if any) in the view. */
00124     if(customerModel->rowCount() > 0)
00125       customerView->setCurrentIndex(customerModel->index(0, 0));
00126 }
00127 
00128 /* updates the view with the vehicles data. */
00129 void
00130 MainForm::updateVehicleView() {
00131     /* get the current selected customer from the view. */
00132     const QModelIndex index = customerView->currentIndex();
00133 
00134     /* if the customer is valid. */
00135     if (index.isValid()) {
00136         /* get the record of the customer. */
00137         const QSqlRecord record = customerModel->record(index.row());
00138 
00139         /* get the id of the customer. */
00140         const int id = record.value(CustomerForm::Customer_Id).toInt();
00141 
00142         /* filter vehicles depending on the customer's id. */
00143         vehicleModel->setFilter(QString("cust_id = %1").arg(id));
00144 
00145         /* show the appropriate message for this selection. */
00146         vehicleLabel->setText(vehiclesOfStr.arg(record.value(CustomerForm::Customer_Name).toString()));
00147     } else {
00148         /* do not show any vehicles. */
00149         vehicleModel->setFilter("cust_id = -1");
00150 
00151         /* show the appropriate message for this selection. */
00152         vehicleLabel->setText(vehiclesStr);
00153     }
00154 
00155     /* select the vehicle model in order to apply the new filtering. */
00156     vehicleModel->select();
00157 
00158     /* show/hide the header of the view according of the records count. */
00159     vehicleView->horizontalHeader()->setVisible(vehicleModel->rowCount() > 0);
00160 
00161     /* perform some operations with columns' width. */
00162     vehicleView->resizeColumnsToContents();
00163     vehicleView->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00164 }
00165 
00166 /* updates the view with the customers data. */
00167 void
00168 MainForm::updateCustomerView() {
00169     /* select the customers model in order to show the new changes. */
00170     customerModel->select();
00171 
00172     /* show/hide the header of the view according of the records count. */
00173     customerView->horizontalHeader()->setVisible(customerModel->rowCount() > 0);
00174 
00175     /* perform some operations with columns' width. */
00176     customerView->resizeColumnsToContents();
00177     customerView->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00178 }

00180 /* opens a form to manager application's settings. */
00181 void
00182 MainForm::editSettings() {
00183     /* declare the form which manages settings. */
00184     SettingsForm form(sets, this);
00185 
00186     /* execute the form. */
00187     form.exec();
00188 
00189     /* try to establish again any changes. */
00190     establishSettings();
00191 }
00192 
00193 /* opens a form to manage vehicles. */
00194 void
00195 MainForm::editVehicles() {
00196     /* assume that no vehicle is selected from the view. */
00197     int vehicleId = -1;
00198 
00199     /* try to get the selected vehicle from the view. */
00200     const QModelIndex index = vehicleView->currentIndex();
00201 
00202     /* if the selected vehicle is valid. */
00203     if (index.isValid()) {
00204         /* get the record of the vehicle. */
00205         const QSqlRecord record = vehicleModel->record(index.row());
00206 
00207         /* get the id of the vehicle. */
00208         vehicleId = record.value(VehicleForm::Vehicle_Id).toInt();
00209     }
00210 
00211     /* declare the form which manages vehicles. */
00212     VehicleForm form(sets.parkingCapacity, vehicleId, this);
00213 
00214     /* execute the form. */
00215     form.exec();
00216 
00217     /* update the view of the vehicles because changes may happen. */
00218     updateVehicleView();
00219 }
00220 
00221 /* opens a form to manage customers. */
00222 void
00223 MainForm::editCustomers() {
00224     /* assume that no customer is selected from the view. */
00225     int customerId = -1;
00226 
00227     /* try to get the selected customer from the view. */
00228     const QModelIndex index = customerView->currentIndex();
00229 
00230     /* if the selected customer is valid. */
00231     if (index.isValid()) {
00232         /* get the record of the customer. */
00233         const QSqlRecord record = customerModel->record(index.row());
00234 
00235         /* get the id of the customer. */
00236         customerId = record.value(CustomerForm::Customer_Id).toInt();
00237     }
00238 
00239     /* declare the form which manages customers. */
00240     CustomerForm form(customerId, this);
00241 
00242     /* execute the form. */
00243     form.exec();
00244 
00245     /* update the view of the customers because changes may happen. */
00246     updateCustomerView();
00247 }

00269 /* opens an about dialog. */
00270 void
00271 MainForm::handleAbout() {
00272     QMessageBox::about(this, appName,
00273                        "<h2>" + appName + " " + appVersion + "</h2>"
00274                        "<p>" + appCopyright + "</p>"
00275                        "<p align='justify'>" + appLicense  + "</p>");
00276 }

00279 /* show/hide guest's vehicles. */
00280 void
00281 MainForm::handleGuestVehicles(const bool buttonPressed) {
00282     /* if the button is pressed. */
00283     if (buttonPressed) {
00284         /* show guest's vehicles. */
00285         vehicleModel->setFilter("cust_id = 1");
00286 
00287         /* show the appropriate message for this selection. */
00288         vehicleLabel->setText(vehiclesStr);
00289 
00290         /* perform some operations with columns' width. */
00291         vehicleView->resizeColumnsToContents();
00292         vehicleView->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00293 
00294         /* show/hide the header of the view according of the records count. */
00295         vehicleView->horizontalHeader()->setVisible(vehicleModel->rowCount() > 0);
00296     }
00297     else {
00298         /* if the button is not pressed update the vehicle view. */
00299         updateVehicleView();
00300     }
00301 }
00302 
00303 /* establish the settings of the program.
00304    also check, create them if not exist. */
00305 void MainForm::establishSettings() {
00306     QSettings s(setsAppOrg, setsAppName);
00307 
00308     s.beginGroup("parking");
00309     if (s.value("capacity").isNull()
00310         || s.value("capacity").toInt() < MIN_PARKING_CAPACITY
00311         || s.value("capacity").toInt() > MAX_PARKING_CAPACITY) {
00312         s.setValue("capacity", DEF_PARKING_CAPACITY);
00313     } else {
00314         sets.parkingCapacity = s.value("capacity").toInt();
00315     }
00316     s.endGroup();
00317 
00318     s.beginGroup("payment");
00319     if (s.value("timeslice").isNull()
00320         || s.value("timeslice").toInt() < MIN_TIMESLICE
00321         || s.value("timeslice").toInt() > MAX_TIMESLICE) {
00322         s.setValue("timeslice", DEF_TIMESLICE);
00323     } else {
00324         sets.timeslice = s.value("timeslice").toInt();
00325     }
00326 
00327     if (s.value("charge_per_timeslice").isNull()
00328         || isLessThan(s.value("charge_per_timeslice").toDouble(), MIN_CHARGE_PER_TIMESLICE)
00329         || isGreaterThan(s.value("charge_per_timeslice").toDouble(), MAX_CHARGE_PER_TIMESLICE)) {
00330         s.setValue("charge_per_timeslice", DEF_CHARGE_PER_TIMESLICE);
00331     } else {
00332         sets.chargePerTimeslice = s.value("charge_per_timeslice").toDouble();
00333     }
00334 
00335     if (s.value("charge_precision").isNull()
00336         || s.value("charge_precision").toInt() < MIN_CHARGE_PRECISION
00337         || s.value("charge_precision").toInt() > MAX_CHARGE_PRECISION) {
00338         s.setValue("charge_precision", DEF_CHARGE_PRECISION);
00339     } else {
00340         sets.chargePrecision = s.value("charge_precision").toInt();
00341     }
00342 
00343     s.endGroup();
00344 
00345     /* try to write down the settings. */
00346     s.sync();
00347 
00348     /* if the app cannot write the settings. */
00349     if (s.status() != QSettings::NoError) {
00350         /* show a message. */
00351         QMessageBox::critical(this, infoMsgTitleStr, cantWriteSetsStr);
00352 
00353         /* terminate the program. */
00354         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00355     }
00356 }
00357 
00358 /* creates the panel for the customers. */
00359 void
00360 MainForm::createCustomerPanel() {
00361     /* create the panel for the customers. */
00362     customerPanel = new QWidget;
00363 
00364     /* create the model for the customers. */
00365     customerModel = new QSqlRelationalTableModel(this);
00366 
00367     /* set the table to select. */
00368     customerModel->setTable("customer");
00369 
00370     /* get only the real customers. */
00371     customerModel->setFilter("customer.id != 1");
00372 
00373     /* set a relation for the card type of the customer. */
00374     customerModel->setRelation(CustomerForm::Customer_CardId, QSqlRelation("cardtype", "id", "title"));
00375 
00376     /* sort in ascending order by customer name. */
00377     customerModel->setSort(CustomerForm::Customer_Name, Qt::AscendingOrder);
00378 
00379     /* set the headers text. */
00380     customerModel->setHeaderData(CustomerForm::Customer_Name, Qt::Horizontal, nameStr);
00381     customerModel->setHeaderData(CustomerForm::Customer_CardId, Qt::Horizontal, cardStr);
00382     customerModel->setHeaderData(CustomerForm::Customer_Phone, Qt::Horizontal, phoneStr);
00383 
00384     /* select the model in order to apply the changes. */
00385     customerModel->select();
00386 
00387     /* create the table view of the customers. */
00388     customerView = new QTableView;
00389 
00390     /* assign the model to the table view. */
00391     customerView->setModel(customerModel);
00392 
00393     /* set some operative options in the table view. */
00394     customerView->setItemDelegate(new QSqlRelationalDelegate(this));
00395     customerView->setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00396     customerView->setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectRows);
00397     customerView->setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::NoEditTriggers);
00398 
00399     /* hide the following columns. */
00400     customerView->setColumnHidden(CustomerForm::Customer_Id, true);
00401     customerView->setColumnHidden(CustomerForm::Customer_City, true);
00402     customerView->setColumnHidden(CustomerForm::Customer_State, true);
00403     customerView->setColumnHidden(CustomerForm::Customer_Address, true);
00404     customerView->setColumnHidden(CustomerForm::Customer_Email, true);
00405     customerView->setColumnHidden(CustomerForm::Customer_CardDate, true);
00406     customerView->setColumnHidden(CustomerForm::Customer_CardMoney, true);
00407 
00408     /* perform some operations with columns' width. */
00409     customerView->resizeColumnsToContents();
00410     customerView->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00411 
00412     /* signal/slot assignment in order to filter the vehicles when a customer is changed. */
00413     connect(customerView->selectionModel(), SIGNAL(currentRowChanged(const QModelIndex &, const QModelIndex &)), this, SLOT(updateVehicleView()));
00414 
00415     /* create the label before the panel. */
00416     customerLabel = new QLabel(customersStr);
00417     customerLabel->setBuddy(customerView);
00418 
00419     /* create a vertical layout. */
00420     QVBoxLayout *layout = new QVBoxLayout;
00421 
00422     /* add to the layout the label describing the table view. */
00423     layout->addWidget(customerLabel);
00424 
00425     /* add to the layout the table view. */
00426     layout->addWidget(customerView);
00427 
00428     /* add the layout to the panel. */
00429     customerPanel->setLayout(layout);
00430 }
00431 
00432 /* creates the panel for the vehicles. */
00433 void
00434 MainForm::createVehiclePanel() {
00435     /* create the panel for the vehicles. */
00436     vehiclePanel = new QWidget;
00437 
00438     /* create the model for the vehicles. */
00439     vehicleModel = new QSqlRelationalTableModel(this);
00440 
00441     /* set the table to select. */
00442     vehicleModel->setTable("vehicle");
00443 
00444     /* set a relation for the customer of the vehicle. */
00445     vehicleModel->setRelation(VehicleForm::Vehicle_CustomerId, QSqlRelation("customer", "id", "name"));
00446 
00447     /* sort in ascending order by vehicle name. */
00448     vehicleModel->setSort(VehicleForm::Vehicle_Name, Qt::AscendingOrder);
00449 
00450     /* set the headers text. */
00451     vehicleModel->setHeaderData(VehicleForm::Vehicle_Name, Qt::Horizontal, vehicleStr);
00452     vehicleModel->setHeaderData(VehicleForm::Vehicle_Description, Qt::Horizontal, descStr);
00453 
00454     /* select the model in order to apply the changes. */
00455     vehicleModel->select();
00456 
00457     /* create the table view of the vehicles. */
00458     vehicleView = new QTableView;
00459 
00460     /* assign the model to the table view. */
00461     vehicleView->setModel(vehicleModel);
00462 
00463     /* set some operative options in the table view. */
00464     vehicleView->setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00465     vehicleView->setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectRows);
00466     vehicleView->setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::NoEditTriggers);
00467     vehicleView->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00468 
00469     /* hide the following columns. */
00470     vehicleView->setColumnHidden(VehicleForm::Vehicle_Id, true);
00471     vehicleView->setColumnHidden(VehicleForm::Vehicle_CustomerId, true);
00472 
00473     /* perform some operations with columns' width. */
00474     vehicleView->resizeColumnsToContents();
00475     vehicleView->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00476 
00477     /* create the label before the panel. */
00478     vehicleLabel = new QLabel(vehiclesStr);
00479     vehicleLabel->setBuddy(vehicleView);
00480 
00481     /* create a vertical layout. */
00482     QVBoxLayout *layout = new QVBoxLayout;
00483 
00484     /* add to the layout the label describing the table view. */
00485     layout->addWidget(vehicleLabel);
00486 
00487     /* add to the layout the table view. */
00488     layout->addWidget(vehicleView);
00489 
00490     /* add the layout to the panel. */
00491     vehiclePanel->setLayout(layout);
00492 }
